analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0xbfbe5332f172d77811bc6c272844f3e54a7b23bb.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xbfbe5332f172d77811bc6c272844f3e54a7b23bb.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
